mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posting (postcd,pmemcd,concd,memgrade,comment,deleteyn,spoilyn,regidate,updatedate) values (#{postCD},#{pmemCD},#{conCD},#{memGrade},#{comment},#{deleteYn},#{spoilYn},now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY update memGrade=#{memGrade},comment=#{comment},updatedate=now();
mapper.select: select posting.postcd,posting.pmemCD,posting.concd,posting.memgrade,posting.comment,contents.title,contents.director,contents.image,contents.link,contents.actor from posting,contents where posting.pmemcd=#{memCD} and ifnull(posting.deleteyn,'N')='N' and contents.concd=posting.concd order by updatedate desc;
mapper.update: update posting set memgrade=#{memGrade},comment=#{comment}, review=#{review},updatedate=now() where postcd=#{postCD}
mapper.select: select member.memCD,member.memNm,member.imgPath,posting.memgrade,posting.postCD,posting.comment,posting.updatedate from posting,member where posting.concd=#{conCD} and ifnull(posting.deleteyn,'N')='N' and posting.pmemcd=member.memCD and member.commOpenChk='A' order by posting.updatedate desc;
select avg(memgrade) from posting where concd=#{conCD}
